Mary, which was No. 1 among newborn girls in 1960, is now 124. Deborah, which was No. 2 in 1960, is now 907th. Barbara, then 12th, is now 899th. Today, Catherine is the 267th most popular name; Ellen, the 804th. Neither Lisa nor Susan is among the top 1,000 most popular girls’ names.
